languages.text: {n}В похлебке лопается пузырек, с хлюпаньем высвобождая тошнотворную вонь. Ваше {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}благородное нутро{/d} протестует против грядущего надругательства. Еще не поздно одуматься.{/n}

{n}A bubble rises out of the soup and bursts with a malodorous squelch. You can feel your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}noble insides{/d} protest against the crime you are intent on committing. It is still not too late to come to your senses.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В похлебке лопается пузырек, с хлюпаньем высвобождая тошнотворную вонь. Ваше {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}благородное нутро{/d} протестует против грядущего надругательства. Еще не поздно одуматься.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aus der Suppe steigt eine Blase auf und platzt mit einem schmatzenden Geräusch. Du spürst, wie deine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}noblen Eingeweide{/d} gegen das Verbrechen protestieren, dass du gleich begehen wirst. Noch ist es nicht zu spät, um zur Vernunft zu kommen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bubble rises out of the soup and bursts with a malodorous squelch. You can feel your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}noble insides{/d} protest against the crime you are intent on committing. It is still not too late to come to your senses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus der Suppe steigt eine Blase auf und platzt mit einem schmatzenden Geräusch. Du spürst, wie deine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}noblen Eingeweide{/d} gegen das Verbrechen protestieren, dass du gleich begehen wirst. Noch ist es nicht zu spät, um zur Vernunft zu kommen."

languages.text: {n}Une bulle se forme à la surface de la soupe avant d'éclater en répandant une odeur méphitique. Vous sentez vos {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}nobles entrailles{/d} se révolter face au crime que vous avez l'intention de commettre. Il est encore temps de revenir à la raison.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bubble rises out of the soup and bursts with a malodorous squelch. You can feel your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}noble insides{/d} protest against the crime you are intent on committing. It is still not too late to come to your senses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une bulle se forme à la surface de la soupe avant d'éclater en répandant une odeur méphitique. Vous sentez vos {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}nobles entrailles{/d} se révolter face au crime que vous avez l'intention de commettre. Il est encore temps de revenir à la raison.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una burbuja se forma en la superficie del caldo y revienta con un hediondo chapoteo. Notas que tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}paladar de noble{/d} protesta contra la atrocidad a la que estás a punto de someterlo. Aún estás a tiempo de recapacitar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bubble rises out of the soup and bursts with a malodorous squelch. You can feel your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}noble insides{/d} protest against the crime you are intent on committing. It is still not too late to come to your senses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una burbuja se forma en la superficie del caldo y revienta con un hediondo chapoteo. Notas que tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}paladar de noble{/d} protesta contra la atrocidad a la que estás a punto de someterlo. Aún estás a tiempo de recapacitar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}スープの中から泡が立ち上がり、音を立てて破裂して悪臭を放つ。あなたは自分が犯そうとしている犯罪に対して、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}内なる貴族{/d}が抗議するのを感じる。今なら正気に戻ってもまだ遅くはない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bubble rises out of the soup and bursts with a malodorous squelch. You can feel your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}noble insides{/d} protest against the crime you are intent on committing. It is still not too late to come to your senses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}スープの中から泡が立ち上がり、音を立てて破裂して悪臭を放つ。あなたは自分が犯そうとしている犯罪に対して、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}内なる貴族{/d}が抗議するのを感じる。今なら正気に戻ってもまだ遅くはない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}汤里冒起了一个泡，泡泡破裂了，发出了令人难受的咯吱声。你感觉到你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}身为贵族的一切{/d}都在抗议着你即将犯下的恶行，现在悔悟还为时不晚。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bubble rises out of the soup and bursts with a malodorous squelch. You can feel your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}noble insides{/d} protest against the crime you are intent on committing. It is still not too late to come to your senses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}汤里冒起了一个泡，泡泡破裂了，发出了令人难受的咯吱声。你感觉到你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}身为贵族的一切{/d}都在抗议着你即将犯下的恶行，现在悔悟还为时不晚。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çorbadan bir baloncuk yükselerek patlıyor, şap sesiyle leş gibi bir koku yayılıyor. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}Soylu mutfağına aşina iç organlarının{/d} işlemek üzere olduğun bu suça karşı çıktığını hissedebiliyorsun. Aklını başına toplaman için hâlâ geç değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bubble rises out of the soup and bursts with a malodorous squelch. You can feel your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}noble insides{/d} protest against the crime you are intent on committing. It is still not too late to come to your senses.{/n}
